name: isInstanceOf
description: Determines whether an object is an instance of a ColdFusion interface or component, or of a Java class.

params.name: object
params.description: The CFC instance or Java object that you are testing

params.name: typename
params.description: The name of the interface, component, or Java class of which the object might be an instance

examples.title: Check if Date is instance of java.util.Date
examples.description: Dates in CFML are instances of the java class: `java.util.Date`
